name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon Helper - Virtual Basket Share W Friend

This extension allows you to:

- Convert Product Prices On Amazon Product Page

- Create Virtual Basket (Ability to add productsâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to:

- Convert Product Prices On Amazon Product Page

- Create Virtual Basket (Ability to add products from different amazon websites, ALL IN ONE BASKET)

- Share Your Virtual Basket With Ease (Simply click share basket and share the given url with your friends)

- Remove Item From Basket (Updates price in virtual basket)

- Hide/Show Item From Basket (Updates price if you hide item)

- Shows Which Country The Item Was Imported From (Clickable image, brings you back to the product - no need to keep so many tabs opened)

- Clear Basket (Removes all items from basket immediately)

- Shortcut Tab (Quickly navigate to many amazons websites (.com .co.uk) etc with ease)

- Items In Virtual Basket Show Converted Prices From Popular Currency's (Dollar, Pounds, Euro)
